TopicTitle: Is there a mod that let's you put things into cargo holds?

Articles.Content: I would like to know if theres a mod that let's you spawn smaller things while a plane is on the runway, Because i'm going to make a short ksp movie, And need to do this.
yes, there are several mods with payload bays that can release things.

yes, there are several mods with payload bays that can release things.

Can you give me a link?

Capt. Hunt didn't read your post correctly. While things like B9 Aerospace do add cargo bays, you have to pre-fill them in the SPH and can't just spawn stuff into them after the plane itself has been spawned.

You actually may build such contraption, using:

- B9 or any other mod which has cargo bays to make a plane

- KAS and Infernal Robotics to make a working crane

- Find a mod with truck parts (LLL had cabins, IIRC) to make a truck which will move your payload

- Use docking ports to secure your payload in cargo bay

You can probably use the spawner in the EPL mod to do this easily, just shrink the base part to fit into whatever bay you want -or- add and tweak the module to the part config for the bay itself.

I did this to a duped R3 aircraft carrier floor part and was able to populate my carrier anywhere in the world with updated designs this way.
